en.label: Golarion Calendar (Pathfinder 2e)
en.description: The Absalom Reckoning calendar system used throughout Golarion, the campaign setting for Pathfinder Second Edition. Features twelve months with leap years following Gregorian rules.

months.name: Abadius
months.description: The first month of winter, named after Abadar. A time of commerce, trade negotiations, and planning for the coming year.

months.name: Calistril
months.description: The shortest month, named after Calistria. A time of passion, revenge, and dramatic winter storms. Gains an extra day in leap years.

months.name: Pharast
months.description: The last month of winter, named after Pharasma. A time when the boundary between life and death grows thin.

months.name: Gozran
months.description: The first month of spring, named after Gozreh. Nature awakens and new growth begins throughout the land.

months.name: Desnus
months.description: The second month of spring, named after Desna. A time of travel, dreams, and the pursuit of freedom and luck.

months.name: Sarenith
months.description: The third month of spring, named after Sarenrae. The sun's warmth grows stronger as summer approaches.

months.name: Erastus
months.description: The first month of summer, named after Erastil. A time of hunting, farming, and community gathering.

months.name: Arodus
months.description: The second month of summer, named after Aroden. The peak of summer's heat and the height of human achievement.

months.name: Rova
months.description: The third month of summer, named after Rovagug. A time when the Rough Beast's influence is said to be strongest.

months.name: Lamashan
months.description: The first month of autumn, named after Lamashtu. Harvest time begins, but dark creatures stir in the growing shadows.

months.name: Neth
months.description: The second month of autumn, named after Nethys. A time of magic and mystery as the veil between worlds thins.

months.name: Kuthona
months.description: The third month of autumn and start of winter, named after Zon-Kuthon. The year's darkest month begins.

weekdays.name: Moonday
weekdays.description: Named after the moon, a day for reflection, planning, and quiet contemplation

weekdays.name: Toilday
weekdays.description: A day for hard work, labor, and productive endeavors

weekdays.name: Wealday
weekdays.description: A day for prosperity, trade, and community prosperity

weekdays.name: Oathday
weekdays.description: A day for keeping promises, honoring commitments, and sacred vows

weekdays.name: Fireday
weekdays.description: A day of passion, energy, and vigorous activity

weekdays.name: Starday
weekdays.description: A day for learning, magic, and studying the celestial patterns

weekdays.name: Sunday
weekdays.description: A day of rest, worship, and renewal under the sun's blessing
